JobFullDesc:
The database market is massive (the IDC estimates it to be $89B+ by 2024!) and MongoDB is at the head of its disruption. The MongoDB community is transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.
The Full Stack Engineer of Go-to-market (GTM) operations plays a unique role within the greater go-to-market operations team by driving the effectiveness and efficiency of our customer-facing teams through the best use of technology. This engineer will be responsible for coming up with solutions to business problems around integrations, data ingestion, and transformation.
In this role, you will collaborate with key internal partners and apply your technical proficiency across different stages of the Software Development. The successful candidate will be part of a learning culture, where teamwork and collaboration are encouraged, excellence is rewarded, and diversity is respected and valued.
About the role

Implement custom integrations and data streams across internal business systems (Marketing software, data warehouse, Salesforce, etc)
Manipulate and transform data as needed from the business teams
Build a large-scale batch and real-time platform that will make data pipelines seamless and scalable for GTM teams
Help drive optimization, testing, and tools to improve the business systems
Collaborate with other software engineers across the company to accelerate the growth of the business and remove the data silos
Implement internal front end applications to expose data or control workflows

What success looks like

Working closely to the business using your technical expertise to build creative solutions for the business problems presented
Partnering with internal teams and leveraging their skills and tools to deliver the best solutions
Successfully help hire and train an exceptional team that can deliver fast with a high quality
The Go-to-Market (GTM) team sees you as a source our knowledge of our internal systems and a lead to organize and create technical solutions involving integrations, data management and workflows

The candidate for this position should possess

Experience with enterprise business systems such as Salesforce, Tableau, Data warehousing, Marketing Automation (Eloqua)
AWS services such as EMR, Lambda, S3, Athena, Glue, IAM, RDS, etc
Experience with data modeling, data warehousing, and building ETL pipelines
Ability to build batch and streaming data pipelines with tools such as Spark, Airflow, and cloud-based data services like Google’s BigQuery, Dataproc, and Pub/Sub
Experience developing processes for automating, testing, and deploying your work
Several programming languages (Python, Scala, Java, etc.)
At least 2 years of experience working in Apex Programming, Visual force, controllers, triggers, batch processes, APIs and web services
Good understanding of best practices of coding standards
A diverse set of databases like MongoDB, Cassandra, Redshift, Postgres, etc
Different storage formats such as Parquet, Avro, Arrow, and JSON
Git and Github
CI/CD Pipelines
Fluent English

To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone.
